entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
